mapper.sql: id, fjhao, kehu, zjhao, ydsj, rzsj, rzts, fuzeren, state, remark
mapper.insert: insert into yuding_t (fjhao, kehu,zjhao, ydsj, rzsj, rzts, fuzeren, state, remark) values (#{fjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keHu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ydSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rzSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rzTs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fuzeRen,jdbcType=VARCHAR,}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update yuding_t set fjhao = #{fjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kehu = #{keHu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zjhao = #{keHu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ydsj = #{ydSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rzsj = #{rzSj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rzts = #{rzTs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuzeren = #{fuzeRen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
